response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $950,000. This is a significant discount, allowing you to enjoy substantial savings while securing a high-quality asset. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us, providing you with an exceptional value and maximizing my earnings. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 950000}
